titles: A choice manual, or Rare secrets in physick and chirurgery: collected, & practised by the Right Honourable the Countesse of Kent, late deceased. Whereto are added several experiments of the vertue of Gascon powder, and lapis contra yarvam by a professor of physick. As also most exquisite ways of preserving, conserving, candying &c.
author: Kent, Elizabeth Grey, Countess of, 1581-1651.
W. J.

notes: An edition of: A choice manuall.

keywords: Medicine --  Formulae, receipts, prescriptions --  Early works to 1800.
